core.sim

Class DatabasePopulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.sim.DatabasePopulator

  • public class DatabasePopulator
extends java.lang.Object
    Makes population of database easier. Provides creation and changing of users, sheep etc.
    Version:
    0.2
    Author:
    Lars Erik

      Constructor and Description

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAccessRights(int userId, int farmId)
      Calls the database and adds access rights.
      void addFarms(int numberOfFarms)
      Generates random farms based on given parameter.
      void addSheep(int numberOfSheep)
      Takes in the number of sheep to be generated.
      void addSheep(int numberOfSheep, int farmId)
      Takes in the number of sheep to be generated.
      void addSheep(java.lang.String[][] sheep)
      Adds the parameter via DatabaseConnector class.
      void addUser(java.lang.String[][] user)
      Sends the parameter to database via DatabaseConnector to create a user.
      void deleteFarm()
      Sends a message to DatabaseConnector to wipe farm database.
      void deleteSheep()
      Sends a message to DatabaseConnector that wipes everything in sheep table.
      void deleteStatus()
      Sends a message to DatabaseConnector that wipes everything in status table.
      void deleteUser()
      Deletes all users from the database via DatabaseConnector.
      void killSheep(int id)
      Sets the sheep id to dead.
      java.lang.String listFarms()
      Returns a string of all farms in database with id and name.
      java.lang.String listSheep()
      Returns a string of all users in database with id and name.
      java.lang.String listUsers()
      Returns a string of all users in database with id and name.
      void removeAccessRights(int userId, int farmId)
      Calls the database and removes access rights.
      void reviveSheep(int id)
      Sets the sheep id to alive.

      • addSheep

        public void addSheep(int numberOfSheep,
            int farmId)
        Takes in the number of sheep to be generated. Generates a String[][] with number of sheep and calls DatabaseConnector. Farms is specified in parameter.
        Parameters:
        numberOfSheep -
        farmId -

      • addSheep

        public void addSheep(int numberOfSheep)
        Takes in the number of sheep to be generated. Generates a String[][] with number of sheep and calls DatabaseConnector. Farms is randomly chosen from the farms in the database.
        Parameters:
        numberOfSheep -

      • addSheep

        public void addSheep(java.lang.String[][] sheep)
        Adds the parameter via DatabaseConnector class.
        Parameters:
        sheep -
